medical_history.chief_complaint: RUQ/epigastric abdominal pain, nausea, and profuse vomiting after alcohol consumption.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began after drinking 7 alcoholic beverages last night. The patient has experienced similar episodes three times in the past, once a year ago (precipitated by food) and twice in the past two months (precipitated by heavy alcohol intake). Symptoms improved with omeprazole, but pain returned three hours after initial treatment in the ED.
